name: FIA Formula One World Championship
description: The pinnacle of motorsport, featuring the world's fastest and most technologically advanced racing cars.

name: ABB FIA Formula E World Championship
description: An electric-powered open-wheel racing championship, featuring sustainable technology and exciting city-center circuits.

name: FIA World Rally Championship
description: A grueling off-road rally series, where drivers tackle challenging stages in diverse environments.

name: FIA World Rallycross Championship
description: Action-packed races on mixed-surface tracks, combining rally elements with short lap times and close competition.

name: FIA World Endurance Championship
description: Enduring races with varying distances, featuring the world's best sports cars and drivers.

name: FIA Karting World Championship
description: The highest level of karting competition, showcasing young talent and future stars of motorsport.

name: FIA World Rally-Raid Championship
description: Long-distance off-road races, testing the endurance of competitors and vehicles.

name: FIA GT World Cup
description: A single-race event featuring the most prestigious GT cars and drivers from around the world.

name: FIA European Rallycross Championship
description: A regional rallycross championship with high-level competition and exciting racing.

name: IndyCar
description: Highest Class US open-wheel racing series.

name: Indy
description: Highest Class US open-wheel racing series.
